refnamediv.refpurpose: update group passwords in batch mode

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The chgpasswd command reads a list of group name and password pairs from standard input and uses this information to update a set of existing groups. Each line is of the format:
By default the supplied password must be in clear-text. Default encryption algorithm is DES.
This command is intended to be used in a large system environment where many accounts are created at a single time.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: The options which apply to the chgpasswd command are:

listitem.para: Supplied passwords are in encrypted form.
Use MD5 encryption instead of DES when the supplied passwords are not encrypted.

refsect1.title: CAVEATS
refsect1.para: Remember to set permissions or umask to prevent readability of unencrypted files by other users.
